metadata.title: CVE-2024-7868 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Xpdf 4.05 (and earlier), invalid header info in a DCT (JPEG) stream canlead to an uninitialized variable in the DCT decoder. The proof-of-conceptPDF file causes a segfault attempting to read from an invalid address.

criterions.comment: ipe package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
